topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559f41a763687278dc0014ec#post_559f41a763687278dc0014ec
Yeah, it's not are goal, but Monster girls are growing in popularity so it's gonna be talked about from time to time. 
It happens to 100% of growing fandoms like 
Kill la kill
Steven Universe 
One punch man 
Game of thrones
Splatoon

Hell this site is one of those things, MLP is that kind of topic.

So please 
Post your stuff, it's not my goal to stop you from posting your manga/anime/games.
I just want you to see that we are gonna post are stuff to

topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559f443363687207c70025c1#post_559f443363687207c70025c1
Do what you'd like. No ones (at least not me) but no ones going to be mad if you watch it or not.
I HATED kill la kill when I saw it, but holy shit I freaking love it 
I HATED attack on titan but then I was watching it time the crack of dawn.

You may be surprised, I don't just like monster girls for BOOBS BOOBS BOOBS.
I like monster girls for the character design and they are freaking cute. Kinda like your cute overload with the cat? I forget the name.

But at the end of the day do what you'd like, try the first episode, if you're sold try the manga starting at Chapter 3 if you'd like to see more.
